grika bhashawe manik yannata yedena paryaya padayak wu "sapiros" yana wachanaya si amerikanu aramunuwalata upakara karana indiyawa shri lankawa samaga mithrawa inne thama wasiyatayi - jana aragala w amerikanu aramunuwalata upakara karana indiyawa shri lankawa samaga mithrawa inne thama wasiyatayi - jana aragala wyaparaye waruna rajapaksha kiyayi chanakya jayagoda amarikanu aramunuwalata upakara karana indiyawa shri lankawa samaga mithrathwayak pawathwagena yanne thama wasiyata bawa jana aragala wyaparaya "supiri kridakayan nomathi wuwath shri lankawa shakthimath" - iyan bel "supiri kridakayan nomathi wuwath shri lankawa shakthimath" - iyan bel supiri pita danga pandu yawana muththayiya muralidaran nomathi wuwada engalantha kandayamata dadi abhiyogayak ella kirimata shri lankawa samath bawa engalantha kandayame pera pela pithikaruwaku wana iyan bel pawasayi.

iwanka tramp erik tramp tifani tramp nadayan tramp pawula * dhawala mandiraya * fordam wishwawidyalaya pensilweniya wishwawidyalaya (bies) nishchala depola prawardhaka (da tramp oorganayiseshan) rupawahini nishpadakaya (di aprentis) $4.5 biliyana[1] * dhawala mandira web adawiya sankramana web adawiya janadhipathimaya twitar paudgalika twitar donald jon tramp (upatha: 1946 juni 14) yanu amerikanu jathika wyaparikayek, idakadam sanwardhakayek, rupawahini idiripathkarannek, kathruwarayek saha eksath janapadaye 45 wana janadhipathiwarayada we.
